text:
@realDonaldTrump Wow. Big Crowd.
I hope no-one was a carrier of the Coronavirus.
Being among massive crowds like that is risky.
The chance of someone being a carrier & spreading the virus to others is pretty likely in that environment.
You wouldn't catch ME attending a big group event right now !

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
